targets.query:
from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "Co2 Sensirion 2" and
    r._field == "value"
  )
